# Resume placeholder

This project expects your resume PDF at:

- `public/resume.pdf`

To add your resume:

1. Export your resume as a PDF file.
2. Rename the file to `resume.pdf`.
3. Copy it into this folder (`public/`), replacing any existing file with the same name.

Once added, the **Resume** page will:

- Embed the PDF in the on-page viewer.
- Allow visitors to open and download it using the buttons provided.
